data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Chikwawa who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chikwawa, Malawi
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Chikwawa, Malawi. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Chikwawa, Malawi.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Chikwawa, Malawi.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Kachchi people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 1,055 believers in Chikwawa, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,055 believers in Chikwawa to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Chikwawa, Malawi, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.
